subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “to bud; to begin”
: Compare {{cog|lep|ᰖᰮ|t=shoots that sprout from stump of tree}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

; “cute; adorable”
: {{orthographic borrowing|zh|ja|萌え|tr=moe}}.
